links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
prog: (Sage) [floor(n^n/2) for n in xrange(0,17)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 02 2009(PARI) a(n) = n^n\2; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 18 2016(MAGMA) [Floor(n^n/2): n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 18 2016

extensions: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, May 19 2012
